fields.name: CPU Usage
fields.description: Monitors how much of the CPU is being used by the system and processes.

fields.name: Memory Usage
fields.description: Tracks the amount of RAM in use, free, or cached.

fields.name: Disk Usage
fields.description: Monitors the used and available space on disks or partitions.

fields.name: System Uptime
fields.description: Shows how long the system has been running since the last reboot.

fields.name: Network Traffic
fields.description: Measures the amount of incoming and outgoing data on network interfaces.

fields.name: Processes Count
fields.description: Counts the number of active or running processes.
